# anrich

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Perform enrichment test on a concentration/expression matrix of a hight through-put experiment study.

## Installation

The package is only available through github

``` r
devtools::install_github("anrich")
```

## Get Help

``` r
library(anrich)
?enrichment_test
```
